data.name: Win32AccessDenied_Title
data.value: Blish HUD Access Denied!

data.name: Win32AccessDenied_Description
data.value:
Blish HUD was unable to access to Guild Wars 2 process. It was likely started as an administrator.
Relaunch Blish HUD as an administrator or relaunch Guild Wars 2 without admin.

data.name: GenericUrl_Footer
data.value: Check our troubleshooting guide for this issue or join our Discord 💢help channel.

data.name: ArcDpsSameDir_Description
data.value: There is a custom 'd3d11.dll' (e.g. ArcDPS) in the same directory as Blish HUD which will attempt to inject into Blish HUD and cause it to crash. Please extract Blish HUD into a different folder.

data.name: ArcDpsSameDir_Title
data.value: Blish HUD Can't Run!

data.name: MissingRef_Title
data.value: Blish HUD Needs Re-extracted!

data.name: MissingRef_Description
data.value: Blish HUD was unable to find the ref.dat file. When you download Blish HUD, be sure to extract all files from the zip and ensure they are within the same directory as Blish HUD.exe.

data.name: FileSaveAccessDenied_Title
data.value: Blish HUD Was Blocked From Saving Data!

data.name: FileSaveAccessDenied_Description
data.value:
Blish HUD was actively blocked saving to '{0}' {1}.
This is typically due to an anti-virus blocking us or Window's Controlled Folder Access. Ensure that Blish HUD is explicitly marked as allowed by your anti-virus.

data.name: HttpAccessDenied_Title
data.value: Web access blocked!

data.name: HttpAccessDenied_Description
data.value:
Something explicitly blocked us from making a web request {0}.
If you have an anti-virus or third party firewall utility, please ensure that Blish HUD is manually excluded in its filters.

data.name: CoreUpdateFailed_Title
data.value: Update Failed!

data.name: CoreUpdateFailed_Description
data.value:
Update to v{0} of Blish HUD failed. Relaunch Blish HUD to try again. The error was:
{1}

data.name: FileSaveAccessDenied_Action_ToUpdate
data.value: to update Blish HUD

data.name: FileSaveAccessDenied_Action_ToLoadSettings
data.value: to load your settings

data.name: FileSaveAccessDenied_Action_ToSaveSettings
data.value: to save your settings

data.name: CoreUpdateFailed_Description_Timeout
data.value: There are other instances of Blish HUD running. Please close the other instances first and then run Blish HUD again to complete the update.

data.name: CfaBlocking_Title
data.value: Blish HUD Blocked!

data.name: CfaBlocking_Description
data.value:
Blish HUD was actively blocked saving to '{0}' by what appears to Window's Controlled Folder Access feature.
Please explicitly allow Blish HUD in your "Controlled Folder Access" settings or review the troubleshooting guide linked below.

data.name: NvidiaSettings_Description
NvidiaSettings_OpenControlPanelAction
data.value: Open NVIDIA Control Panel

data.name: NvidiaSettings_Title
data.value: Incompatible NVIDIA Settings

data.name: ConflictingFullscreenSettings_Title
data.value: Conflicting Graphics Settings!

data.name: ConflictingFullscreenSettings_Description
data.value:
Blish HUD has detected that you are running the game with DirectX 9 enabled while in fullscreen. Blish HUD is unable to function in this configuration. To resolve, either:
1) Uncheck "Enable DX9 Rendering (Deprecated)" in your in-game graphics options. 2) Set "Resolution" to "Windowed Fullscreen" or "Window".
You can reference the guide linked below for further assistance.
